text: Balbir Singh Kullar (8 August 1942 â€“ 28 February 2020) was an Indian field hockey player and Punjab Police officer. Best known for his sporting career, he was part of two medal-winning Indian field hockey teams. He won a gold medal at the 1966 Asian Games and a bronze medal at the 1968 Summer Olympics. Singh Kullar was born in Sansarpur. On 18 February 2020, he died in Sansarpur of a heart attack. He was 77. ==References== ==Other websites== *Balbir Singh Kullar at Sports-Reference.com Category:1942 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Indian field hockey players Category:Olympic bronze medalists for India Category:Medalists at the 1968 Summer Olympics
title: Balbir Singh Kullar
